notes.text: Went up the ladder with CA bamboo... I tried to hit KOG with shadow game glad beats and failed miserably so I went back to CA but i could not get that 5th kog game and got de ranked to leg 2. So i switched to our "tier 1" deck and I was able to hit kog with around 11 games. Kog rank up match was the mirror, but he misplayed by wasting his 2 econs and trying to go for gg and he forgot i had some good bacon in the graveyard.
